mapper.insert: insert into post (POST_NO, POST_BRD, POST_MEM, POST_TTL, POST_CNTNT, POST_DATE, POST_STAR, POST_EXST, POST_GU, POST_DONG, POST_ZIP, POST_RD) values (SEQ_POST_NO.NEXTVAL, #{post_brd}, #{post_mem}, #{post_ttl}, #{post_cntnt}, sysdate, #{post_star}, 'N', #{post_gu}, #{post_dong}, #{post_zip}, #{post_rd})
mapper.select: select * from post where post_brd = 1 and post_gu = #{artcl_gu} and post_dong= #{artcl_dong} and post_zip= #{artcl_zip} and post_rd= #{artcl_rd}

select NVL(A.DL_PRICE,0) DL_PRICE , NVL(A.DL_DEPOS,0) DL_DEPOS , NVL(A.DL_RNT,0) DL_RNT , B.DL_CONT_YM2 DL_CONT_YM from (select round(avg(DL_PRICE), 1) as dl_price , round(avg(DL_DEPOS), 1) as dl_depos , round(avg(DL_RNT), 1) as dl_rnt, DL_CONT_YM from deal where dl_gu = #{dl_gu} and dl_dong= #{dl_dong} and dl_zip=#{dl_zip} and dl_rd=#{dl_rd} and dl_ty = #{dl_ty} and dl_excv_area = #{dl_excv_area} GROUP BY DL_EXCV_AREA, DL_TY, DL_CONT_YM, DL_GU, DL_DONG, DL_ZIP, DL_RD order by dl_cont_ym desc) a, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(200801, 'yyyyMM'), level -1),'YYYYMM') as dl_cont_ym2 from dual connect by level < 132) b where a.dl_cont_ym(+) = b.dl_cont_ym2 ORDER BY B.dl_cont_ym2
